name: War of The Worms
description:
War of The Worms is a co-op 1v1 game that pits Two players against each other using mechanics similar to snake.  The first player to 3 points wins.

Controls:

Player 1 - WASD

Player 2 - Arrows

Fruits:

Apple - Increases your length

Orange - Temporarily increases your speed

----

Game Jam Specifics:

Are we beginners? Yes

Was this game created as a team? Yes

Why does our game fit the theme?  There are two worms (players) and two powerups.

Assets used:

Code Monkey's Snake engine - https://unitycodemonkey.com/video.php?v=Iz22-o7l6bc

TextMeshPro - https://unity.com

Zero Rare Free 8 Bit sounds - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/sound-fx-retro-pack-121743

Music:

Eric Skiff - Underclocked (Menu Theme)

NeXsard - Not dead YET (Game Theme)
